sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Container, Grid, Paper, Typography, Box } from '@material-ui/core';
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles';

const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({
  paper: {
    padding: theme.spacing(3),
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    height: '100%',
  },
  title: {
    marginBottom: theme.spacing(3),
  },
  statsBox: {
    backgroundColor: theme.palette.primary.main,
    color: 'white',
    padding: theme.spacing(2),
    borderRadius: theme.spacing(1),
    marginBottom: theme.spacing(2),
  }
}));

function Dashboard({ user }) {
  const classes = useStyles();

  return (
    <Container>
      <Box mt={4}>
        <Typography variant="h4" className={classes.title}>
          Welcome, {user?.fname || 'User'}!
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={3}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper className={classes.paper}>
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Recent Orders
              </Typography>
              <Box className={classes.statsBox}>
                <Typography variant="h4">0</Typography>
                <Typography>Total Orders</Typography>
              </Box>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper className={classes.paper}>
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Inventory Status
              </Typography>
              <Box className={classes.statsBox}>
                <Typography variant="h4">0</Typography>
                <Typography>Products in Stock</Typography>
              </Box>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper className={classes.paper}>
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Quick Actions
              </Typography>
              <Box>
                <Typography>• View Inventory</Typography>
                <Typography>• Place New Order</Typography>
                <Typography>• Check Order Status</Typography>
              </Box>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Box>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default Dashboard;
